participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: David is introspective and struggles with low self-esteem, often feeling isolated but hopeful for change.
participant_1.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i work at a nursing home. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. my wife left me and took my children.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is cheerful and imaginative, with a love for adventure and storytelling, always eager to share her thoughts.
participant_2.background: i'm in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.
